thread.title: Cleveland Orchestra unveils ambitious plans for 2017-18 centennial season (photos)
thread.title_full: Cleveland Orchestra unveils ambitious plans for 2017-18 centennial season (photos)

author: Zachary Lewis, The Plain Dealer
title: Cleveland Orchestra unveils ambitious plans for 2017-18 centennial season (photos)
text: For years, music lovers have waited for the unveiling of the Cleveland Orchestra's 100th anniversary season. Now that moment is here, and at last we're able to gaze on next year's lineup in all its celebratory splendor.
